title: League of Legends Apllication
body: The league of legends application is taking up 12.8 GB of space on my computer. Is this what is supposed to happen, and is there any way to make it take up less space?

replies.body: Hey there, the client should be around 7-8 GB.  If you have a really old install then you could have a lot of old assets and need a fresh install.  You should be able to get a fresh game and get any old assets removed through a clean uninstall via [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  This would remove the game entirely, so you'll have to reinstall it!  I hope that helps!
